comment:
Do you not use pilsner because you have a sack of 2-row?
Not that I didn't think it was extremely successful, just curious, since pilsner would be more traditional.

Coincidentally, I bought some Belgian pilsner malt for this beer. I haven't brewed this one yet so I haven't edited the recipe. The triple you had was Pierre's Triple, this is an alteration of that. 
And to answer your question, yes, I buy regular old two row by the 50# sack which saves $.
